structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Funds Collection And Disbursement; Single Point For Clerk Magistrate And Probation Offices
law.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the administrative justice of a department of the trial court may direct that both the clerk-magistrateâ€™s office and the probation office of one or more court divisions are to utilize a single funds collection and disbursement point within the courthouse.
